poem:
### The Song's Shadow

Beneath the bright lights,  
a shadow lengthens,  
notes of discord  
in the rhythm of fame—  
the laughing crowd,  
the rival crowned,  
truth in a lyric  
sharp as a blade,  
cutting deeper  
than any accolade.  
Even stars must learn  
to dance in the eclipse  
of their own making.
